section1.title: Learning through research
section1.description: The oldest and one of the most prestigious technical universities in Kazakhstan, known for the developments in the fields of mining and oil business

section2.title: Satbayev's Commitment to Academic Excellence
section2.description: For more than 80 years, the university has been synonymous with technological progress and leadership in Kazakhstan.

section3.title: Explore Our Academic Offerings Chart Your Path to Success
section3.description: The university curriculum introduces the teaching of modern specialties, in which currently there are no specialists in Kazakhstan.

section4.title: Student Admission Process and Assistance from us
section4.description: Get higher education in the technical university №1 of Kazakhstan

main.settingsTitle: Institute of digital equipment and technologies
main.settingsSubtitle: The leading organization in Kazakhstan in the field of industrial automation, big data and machine intelligence.
main.personSubtitle: Scientific-technological and educational center, created in order to provide the economy competitive innovative developments.
main.paintSubtitle: One of the leading research institutes of Kazakhstan in the field of materials science, high energy physics and cosmic rays.
main.langTitle: Institute of geological sciences of K.I. Satpayev
main.langSubtitle: Allows a wide range of research in the field of regional geology, stratigraphy, mineralogy, geochemistry of solid, and many more.
main.bookTitle: Institute of Metallurgy and Ore Beneficiation
main.bookSubtitle: Carries out applied research and the development of new technologies in the field of mineral processing, metallurgy and materials science.
main.scienceSubtitle: The only scientific organization in the country in the development of applied problems of hydrogeology and geo-ecology.

admission.subtitle1: Apply for UNT testing at app.testcenter.kz and take the UNT
admission.subtitle2: Take creative exams if you have chosen a creative education program
admission.subtitle3: Apply for a state educational grant at app.testcenter.kz
admission.subtitle4: Grant competition results are published in early August
